Unsubscribe previous sensor
Create topic for temperature reading
func:
msg.topic = msg.payload + String("TR");
return msg;

name: Create topic for error status
func:
msg.topic = msg.payload + String("ES");
return msg;

name: Create topic for battery level
func:
msg.topic = msg.payload + String("BL");
return msg;

name: Subscribe new sensor
Set temperature reading to 2 decimal places
func:
msg.payload = (parseFloat(msg.payload)).toFixed(2);
return msg;

name: Change temperature reading
func:
msg.payload = (parseFloat(msg.payload) - 100).toFixed(2);
return msg;

name: Set the error status
func: return msg;

name: Change battery level
func:
msg.payload = String(parseInt(msg.payload,10) - 20);
return msg;

name: Dashboard Style
format:

    ui-card-panel {
        border-radius: 20px;
